docs.lead_paragraph: A Federal grand jury today indicted a program director in Newark's Model Cities program on two counts of possessing and conspiring to distribute heroin.
docs.abstract: Fed grand jury on Jan 31 indicts D Bernard, Newark, NJ, Model Cities program dir, on 2 counts of possessing and conspiring to distribute heroin; indictment detailed; 3 other defendants, L Wilson, K Mosley and L Moore, were indicted Nov 17, '71 and pleaded guilty while 4th defendant O Curry is fugitive

headline.main: HEROIN ROLE LAID TO A NEWARK AIDE; Model Cities Official Indicted on Distribution Charge

docs.snippet: Edward G. Robinson, whose tough, sinister appearance on movie screens concealed the soul of a gentle man, died today at the age of 79. Mr. Robinson succumbed at Mount Sinai Hospital where he had undergone tests in' recent weeks. The cause of death...
docs.lead_paragraph: Edward G. Robinson, whose tough, sinister appearance on movie screens concealed the soul of a gentle man, died today at the age of 79. Mr. Robinson succumbed at Mount Sinai Hospital where he had undergone tests in' recent weeks. The cause of death was not immediately determined.

headline.main: Edward G. Robinson, 79, Dies; His 'Little Caesar' Set a Style; Man of Great Kindness Edward G. Robinson Is Dead at 79 Made Speeches to Friends Appeared in 100 Films
